definitions.definition: to produce something so that it is the same as an original piece of work:
examples: They've copied the basic design from the Japanese model and added a few of their own refinements.

definitions.definition: something that has been made to be exactly like something else:
examples: This painting is only a copy - the original hangs in the Louvre.

definitions.definition: a single book, newspaper, record, or other printed or recorded text of which many have been produced:
examples: The library has copies of all the national and local newspapers.
